info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 6:10PM EDT until September 08 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Albany County in east central New York... Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 609 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Castleton-On-Hudson, or near East Greenbush, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albany, Troy, East Greenbush, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Hoosick Falls, Nassau, Delmar, Menands, Ravena, Green Island, Grafton, Berlin, Castleton-On-Hudson, West Sand Lake, Averill Park, Selkirk, Center Brunswick, Wyantskill and Feura Bush. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
